Homepage

Welcome to ☼ Daybreak, your resource for data science, my mathematical endeavours, my daybreak expression and initiative.

In the navigation bar at the top you’ll find the following:

  • Math Madness, a section devoted to mathematics, ranging from simple Calculus to A.I.
  • Data Wizardry, a section devoted to data science projects, methodologies, explanations and code implementations in R, Python and Julia.
  • Powerlifters’ Cave, a section devoted to my powerlifting hobby and special metrics and designs of my invention to regulate my training.
